code: import _classCallCheck from"C:\\Users\\HSONNL\\Desktop\\myProject\\NCOV-19\\Repo\\NCOV-19Manager\\client\\node_modules\\babel-preset-react-app\\node_modules\\@babel\\runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from'axios';var GET="/api/shift/";var UPDATE="/api/shift/";var DELETE="/api/shift/";var GETALL="/api/shift";var CREATE="/api/shift";var ShiftAPI=function ShiftAPI(){_classCallCheck(this,ShiftAPI);this.get=function(token,idShift,response,error){axios.get(GET+idShift,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.upDate=function(token,idShift,formData,response,error){var data={"startTime":formData.get("startTime")};axios.put(UPDATE+idShift,data,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.delete=function(token,idShift,response,error){axios({method:'DELETE',url:DELETE+idShift,headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.getAll=function(token,response,error){axios.get(GETALL,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};this.create=function(token,formData,response,error){var data={"startTime":formData.get("startTime"),"endTime":formData.get("endTime")};axios.post(CREATE,data,{headers:{Authorization:token}}).then(response).catch(error);};};export{ShiftAPI as default};
